reference_no_of_permission_being_relied_:
HGY/2020/1014 - Listed Building Consent for works and restoration to include affixing steel fixings to cornices; repointing of brickwork; addition of plastic anti-bird spikes; lead flashing roof repairs; repair of render; cornice an alcove details; and associated steam cleaning.
HGY/2021/3778 - Discharge of Condition: Prior to the specific cleaning, patch and cornice repair works being undertaken, relevant trial repairs of failed render on lower high-level cornice, trial DOFF cleaning and patch repairs of concrete surfaces shall be detailed in additional photographic evidence to be approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority and shall be undertaken in accordance with such details.
HGY/2023/0671 - Discharge of Condition: Prior to the commencement of development of the parapet detailing, a detailed methodology plan shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority for the affixing of steel fixings and parapet consolidation works are undertaken hereby approved and such works shall be undertaken in accordance with these details.
HGY/2023/2617 - Listed Building Consent: Intrusive investigations at high level to the cornice and parapet on the front elevation to allow for an assessment of the condition of structural steels within. This work is to inform a further programme of repairs.
site_name: 9 The Broadway, Wood Green, London, N22 6DS
description: Listed building consent for repairs to the front (west) elevation of the former Gaumont Cinema, including dismantling and rebuilding of the parapet with repairs to structural steel, reinstatement of failed cast concrete cornice, replacement of glazing to front elevation and general repairs, cleaning and redecoration of brick and painted concrete fa√ßade.
